customization.title: Test Your Contact Sensor
customization.p: Separate the Contact Sensor from the magnet to see the device's open and close status update.

customization.title: Give Your Device a Name
customization.note: We recommend using simple, identifying language that is easily recognized by voice assistants.

customization.title: Add Your Device to Favorites
customization.note: Favoriting a device makes it easily accessible from the Dashboard of both the Iris Mobile app and Iris Web Portal.

customization.title: What would you like each button to do?
Who is going to use this device?
customization.p: Don't see the Person you would like to assign it to? Select "Unassigned" and you can assign this device to them after you invite that Person to Iris.

customization.query: base:caps contains 'cont' AND cont:useHint != 'DOOR' AND cont:useHint != 'WINDOW'
customization.title: Will this contact sensor be used on a door or a window?
Test Your Coverage
customization.p: While the pendant can communicate with the hub from up-to 130 ft. away, results may vary based on the layout of your home. Press the button at the furthermost areas of the home.
The device is out of range when you do not receive a notification for each button press. Consider adding Smart Plugs, which serve as range extenders, to increase coverage.

customization.title: What Does This Button Do?
customization.p: Pressing the Care Pendant will trigger a Care Alarm on the Premium and Pro-Monitoring plans, which will immediately alert everyone in the Care Alarm notification list.
Pressing the Care Pendant will trigger a Panic Alarm on the Basic plan, which will immediately alert everyone in the Alarm notification list.
To cancel the Alarm, enter your PIN on the Keypad and press "Off", or cancel in the Iris app or web portal.

customization.title: Important Info
customization.p: If the Door Hinge Sensor does not update its status as 'Closed', when you close your door, then your door may not have good alignment.
If you cannot achieve a 'Closed' status with the supplied set screws, resolve by inserting a longer set screw or tapping a small brad nail into the hole.

customization.title: In what room will this device be installed?
customization.p: Halo will use this room name when speaking to you in the event of an alarm.

customization.title: Select a county and state for the Weather Radio
Select an Emergency Weather Station
customization.note: Station quality should increase when plugged into AC power during installation.
customization.p: Select the play button to determine which radio station is the clearest. You'll hear the radio playing through Halo.

customization.title: Emergency and Weather Alerts
customization.p: Halo is pre-programmed to alert you with over 25 emergency and weather alerts.
Manage these and over 50 more alerts on Halo's detail page.

customization.title: Test Halo
customization.p: Test the device by pressing the center Halo button and confirm that Halo is sounding properly.

customization.title: Sounding Device
customization.p: The device will sound by default when a Security, Panic, Smoke, or CO Alarm is triggered. To cancel the Alarm, enter your PIN on the Keypad and press "Off", or cancel in the Iris app or web portal.

customization.title: Create a Favorites Position
customization.p: Move the blind to the desired height, then press and hold the 'MY' button on the remote until the blind moves slightly.
On the Blinds device page, select the 'Favorite' button to move the blind to the Favorite position. When the blind is moving, selecting the 'Favorite' button to stop it from moving.

customization.title: Vents
customization.p: Please consult an HVAC professional or the device manufacturer for best practices on maintaining your HVAC system.

customization.title: Firmware Upgrade Needed
customization.note: Select the button below to continue setting up your device. The update will continue in the background.
customization.p: Updates to your recently paired devices may take a few minutes, during which your device may not be controllable or work optimally.
Please do not remove power or any ethernet cords (if applicable) from the device until the firmware update is complete.

customization.title: Water Heater Assistance
customization.p: Should your water heater ever have a problem, this information will be passed along to the Contact Center.
This information is typically found on the water heater's data plate.

customization.title: Reminder
customization.p: The LCD screen on your water heater will display the maximum water temperature set point.
For safety reasons, Iris cannot increase the temperature beyond the maximum set point on the device.

customization.title: Select and rename each zone you want to use.
customization.p: (e.g. Front Yard, Flower bed)
Edit the name and default watering time on your device.

customization.title: Security Alarm Updated
customization.note: Any changes made will take effect next time you arm your system. Change these settings any time in the Alarm card.
customization.p: You have paired a device that automatically participates in your Security Alarm system. Review the default settings below and customize your preferred settings.

customization.title: Uncertified Device
customization.p: This device was paired as an uncertified device. Uncertified items may work but are not supported by the Iris Support Team. If your device malfunctions, please contact the deviceâ€™s manufacturer.

customization.title: Unsupported Device
customization.p: This device was paired as an unsupported device. Unsupported items will not work correctly.
If you think this is a mistake and believe this is a supported device, try removing and re-pairing the device.

customization.title: Set a Schedule
customization.p: Set up a schedule to automate your device while you are away from home.

customization.p: To help get started, Iris created a default schedule.

customization.title: Smart Button
customization.p: We set up your newly added button to triple-beep the hub when you press it.
You can change this by visiting the Rules section in the Iris Web Portal or Mobile Application.
